gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 110, Trail Blazers 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Trail Blazers, 110-100. Trey Murphy III led all scorers with 31 points, along with eight rebounds and three assists for the Pelicans, while CJ McCollum (29 points, five rebounds, five 3PM) and Zion Williamson (22 points, seven rebounds, three assists) added a combined 51 points in the victory. Scoot Henderson tallied 19 points and a career-high 15 assists for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Pelicans have won back-to-back games as they improve to 47-32 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 21-58.
